name: Skarabeusz
overview: Skarabeusz is a Polish computer adaptation of Scrabble for up to four players, played on a 15x15 grid board. Each player starts the round with seven letters, which may be replaced or placed on the board. Each letter has a certain value. For an arranged word, the player receives as many points as located on the letters forming the word. Each color on the board has a special characteristics causing doubling or tripling points for letters or arranged words. As a free bonus, Masa Krytyczna and Kości zostały rzucone are added in the box.
